transcript: [Visual: The podcast introduces Bobby Fischer's controversial views, including his disparaging comments on women and their chess abilities; Speaker mentions Fischer's negative opinions.] : So what I'm hearing is you love Bobby Fischer and you think his opinions about the Jews are all correct. : And on women. : He had some, some fun takes about how women are terrible at chess. [Visual: A woman is seen in profile at a podcast, with the text 'about how' visible at the bottom.] : Oh, they're terrible chess players. [Visual: The speakers sarcastically agree with the previous statements about women's chess abilities, making sexist remarks about women's place, while questioning the relevance of previous statements.] : They could beat anyone, even a queen down. : I don't know why. [Visual: A woman is seen in profile at a podcast, with the text 'even a' visible at the bottom.] : I guess they're just not so smart. [Visual: A close-up black and white shot of a young man, talking.] [Visual: A very close, slightly blurry, black and white shot of a young man, smiling.] : That they belong in the kitchen. [Visual: A woman is seen in profile at a podcast, with the text 'in the kitchen' visible at the bottom.] : No, they can't cook, but they stay in the house. [Visual: A close-up black and white shot of a young man, smiling.]

[Visual: Speaker states her desire to sculpt her upper glutes and clarifies what she means by this.] [Visual: A woman with long brown hair speaks into a microphone with a podcast logo visible.] [Visual: Speaker explains that the shape of the glutes may not change dramatically, but they can become more lean.] : I want upper booty. [Visual: Another Speaker questions whether her glutes will get smaller as a result of the workout.] : You know, like when you sculpt? [Visual: Speaker clarifies that she believes the speaker's glutes are already perfect and that she wants to sculpt them.] : I don't think your booty shape is gonna change. : What you have will get more lean. [Visual: A split screen shows two women each speaking into a microphone with a podcast logo visible.] : Wait, so you're telling me I'm gonna work out and my booty's gonna get smaller? [Visual: A woman with long brown hair speaks into a microphone with a podcast logo visible.] : I don't think you need a bigger booty. : I think yours is perfect. : I don't think I need a bigger booty. : I just want a sculpt.
